about_the_game:
Delve deeper into the world of 'A Park Full of Cats' with our spine-tingling expansion, 'HAUNTED RIDE.' This eerie add-on takes you on a supernatural adventure within the ever-popular amusement park. Here, feline inhabitants aren't what they seem, they'll try anything to scare you! Pet them so they reveal their true nature!



'HAUNTED RIDE' DLC Features:

Spine-Tingling Scenarios: Traverse through eight bone-chilling scenarios teeming with mysterious cats and eerie ghostly encounters. Mummies, zombies, vampires galore!

Eerie Amusement: Immerse yourself in an aMEOWsement park ride like no other. Each scenario within the Haunted Ride expansion promises new challenges, heart-pounding surprises, and a captivating atmosphere.

Extended Gameplay: Dive deep into the PAWranormal mysteries of the Haunted Ride and uncover the hidden-secrets of the Haunted Ride!



Are you ready to step into the chilling world of 'HAUNTED RIDE'? This DLC for 'A Park Full of Cats' promises to test your courage and your love for feline friends. Brace yourself to unveil the hidden mysteries in this hair-raising expansion.

short_description: Prepare to be thrilled and chilled on "A Park Full of Cats : HAUNTED RIDE",' the eerie downloadable content for 'A Park Full of Cats.' Embark on a ghostly adventure through eight haunting scenarios! Are you brave enough to face the Haunted Ride?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
